titleStmt.title: A plea for anti-pædobaptists, against the vanity and falshood of scribled papers, entituled, The anabaptists anatomiz'd and silenc'd in a public dispute at Abergaveny in Monmouth-shire Sept. 5. 1653. Betwixt John Tombes, John Cragg, and Henry Vaughan, touching infant-baptism. By John Tombes, B.D.
titleStmt.author: Tombes, John, 1603?-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills, and are to be sold at his house at the sign of Sir John Old-Castle in Py-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
